ygData.subject: Re: Banshee vs Pets
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Didn t we get Banshee Aura a long time ago?  I thought that we got it at 39th, but they replaced it with shieldskin, which disappointed me greatly. ... The
ygData.messageBody:
Tony Donatelli wrote:
>

> Actually, come to think of it, I like the damage shield idea even better
> than the lifetap series. Ok, so healing and any type of downtime reduction
> is right out, I can live with that (I got used to it, played a mostly-solo
> warrior to 31). But Banshee Aura (et. al) would be wonderful! Rangers get
> thorns, dangit, let me chill some kobolds to the bone! It's also more damage
> we can put out, HENCE Beld wouldn't mind it. Go damage shields go! Good
> thinking, man!
>

Didn't we get Banshee Aura a long time ago? I thought that we got it at
39th, but they replaced it with shieldskin, which disappointed me
greatly.

> Btw, the only 39 spell I'm looking forward to is Heart Flutter, all the
> others are, well... crap. (sorry Brian) Cancel Magic, ok for those dots that
> just won't come off. Shadow Vortex, gimme a break, no one EVER uses that
> spell. Pet spell, shah right. Shield Skin, heh what a joke, absorb one hit
> for a ton of mana AND reagents, no thanks my 136 Agi will do a better job
> for free. And the list goes on...
>

The 30th level spells do have more drool factor than the 39th, but
as I haven't had a chance to see their uses yet, I might be wrong.
I've noticed that subtle effects on spells make or break a fight.
How many times have you died within feet of the zone? Shieldskin
would have saved you there. Also Resist Cold might help when fighting
wizards who use AE frost spells.

Does anyone know the damage and ticks for Heart Flutter? Or the
-Str -AC effect that it has?

And in teh last patch they said Heart Flutter works better now,
has anyone tried it to see the difference?

Xilith
